text: Kylie Jenner and Tyga have been driving fans wild with their ` ` are they or aren't they?'' relationship ever since getting together in 2014. There were engagement and breakup rumors. They appeared on each other's Instagram accounts. They shot down pregnancy reports. And they took their romance to the next level : Snapchat. ( Hands up if that video of Kylie ` ` kissing'' Tyga's grill come to mind right away. ) Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Here's a look at how ` ` Kyga'' came to be.
